name: Email to Slack
description: Get your Emails delivered on a slack channel

APP_ID.description: You get this when you create the app

SLACK_PAYLOAD_TOKEN.description: You get this when you create the app

CHANNEL_ID.description: The ID of the channel you want to send your emails to

MY_DM_CHANNEL.description: The ID of the direct messaging channel between you and @slackbot

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: Token of a slack bot which has the permission to post to $CHANNEL_ID

SLACK_WORKSPACE_TOKEN_FOR_APP.description: Find it in our Slack App's 'OAuth and Permissions' tab
